content.description: Climb up from the end of 'Sex Lord Elect'. Use easy jugs at the beginning and trend left to top out on the other face of the boulder.
content.location: Start just to the right of the end of 'Sex Lord Elect' where the face of the boulder turns into the next. Identifiable by the rather large horn of rock.

content.description: North most boulder of the north cluster. Start on the right of the boulder looking north and climb left, variety of good holds for feet and hands. route finishes at the center of the boulder after climbing under the outcropping.
content.location: Hiking to the south from Grandin this is the first boulder you will encounter. There is an oil derrick off the main path where you can get to the rocks.

content.description: Easy climb up to a great view of the boulders. Start either at the south tip of the boulder or the flake in the middle of the face.
content.location: South most boulder in the north cluster.

content.description: Utilize a long iron deposit to traverse along the length of the boulder. Readily available features get you up to the seam.
content.location: Start at the south corner of the north eastern boulder.

content.description: Sit start at the bottom of the large crack in the boulder and get our feet out wide to the right. Pulling the peak of the arrow is a thrilling move.
content.location: Very easy to find, locate the arrowhead shaped rock between the north and south clusters.

content.description: Secluded boulders  in remote area of President, Pa. Area includes 9 boulders.
